This is a Dogue de Bordeaux, also known as a French Mastiff. It is a large, muscular breed of dog with a short, smooth coat, a broad head, and a powerful jaw.
The Dogue de Bordeaux, also known as the French Mastiff, is a large, muscular dog breed that originated in France. It has a short, fine coat, a large head, and a strong, muscular body.
